#text=The first and only time I have rode on a train was in November 1978 .
#text=My family and I traveled to Carbondale Illinois on an Amtrak train for Thanksgiving .
#text=I had a brother who attended Southern Illinois University and we had dinner with his family .
#text=I remember the ride being long but smooth .
#text=My sister and I took turns sitting by the window .
#text=Sometimes all we saw was cornfields and cattle .
#text=Occasionally , we would pass a small town and see people at different stops .
#text=We didn ' t order food on the train because we brought our own .
#text=We actually had brought cakes , pies and sandwiches to carry us over .
#text=We shared our food with the people around us .
#text=The whole car sang Christmas carols and there was plenty of laughter .
#text=I would love to take a train vacation and travel from the West coast back to the East coast .
#text=When that comes , I think I will eat whatever they are serving on the train .
